trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section that contains child entries that are <xref uid="langword_csharp_behavior" name="behavior" href=""></xref> elements identified by their unique <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref>.
A `behavior` element contains a collection of settings for the behavior of a service.
Each behavior is indexed by its `name`.
Services use behaviors by linking to them using this name.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorsSection"></xref> class.
Gets all the child entries that are endpoint behavior elements identified by their unique <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref>.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.EndpointBehaviorElementCollection"></xref> that contains endpoint behavior elements identified by their unique <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
Gets all the child entries that are service behavior elements identified by their unique <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref>.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceBehaviorElementCollection"></xref> that contains service behavior elements identified by their unique <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref>.
